lille1.pool

Class ResourcePool<T extends Resource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • lille1.pool.ResourcePool<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasketPool, CubiclePool

    public abstract class ResourcePool<T extends Resource>
extends java.lang.Object
    ResourcePool is the abstract class to describe a resource pool with available and used resources.
    Author:
    Amelie M., Laurent.T, Thibault.C, Quentin.G.
